titleStmt.title: Animadversions on a treatise intituled Fiat lux, or, A guide in differences of religion, between papist and Protestant, Presbyterian and independent by a Protestant.
titleStmt.author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Cotes, for Henry Cripps ... and George West ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by John Owen. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Page 31 has print missing, and pages 189-190 are stained in the filmed copy. Beginning-p. 199 photographed from Trinity College Library, Cambridge, England copy, and inserted at end.
